ctu_text: "}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 1, "value": "cash", "label": "Cash"}, "benefits": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Financial Assistance for the children of registered folk artistes", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ul_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Girl and Boy children studying 10th - \u20b91,000/- "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Girl children studying 11th - \u20b91,000/- "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Girl and Boy children studying 12th - \u20b91,500/- "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Regular Degree Course with Hostel facility - \u20b93,250/- "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Regular Post Graduate Course with Hostel facility - \u20b95,000/-"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Professional Degree Course with Hostel facility - \u20b96,000/- "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Professional PG Course with Hostel facility - \u20b910,000/- "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "ITI or Polytechnic Course with Hostel Facility - \u20b92,200/-"}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}]}, "applicationProcess": [{"mode": "Offline", "process": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"bold": true, "text": "Step 1: "}, {"text": "The interested applicant should visit (during office hours) the "}, {"type": "link", "link": "https://www. tn. gov. in/rti/proactive/inftour/handbook_folkartistboard.

ctu_text: \n1. Assistance is available for up to two children per family. \n1. If both husband and wife are registered folk artists, only one of them is eligible for this assistance.
